item.description:
Hi come out an join us for fun night of singing around a bonfire! Please bring your portable chair, some food for the potluck and any musical instrument that you want as long as it looks like a guitar!

We will be singing songs around the bonfire!

We will be joined by other meetup groups so it should be a fun night!

The front of my driveway will have a "Tiki" torch next to my mailbox, it is a long dirt driveway. Please park on the side of the road or driveway. Bring a flashlight if you can as it's quite dark.

Please do not bring any wood as I have plenty! But brings as much food that you want to share as I'm quite hungry.

A $5 or more donation would be greatly appreciated to help cover the cost of running this meetup group.

If anyone gets lost my telephone number is: 603-312-6735. If it rains or the winds are too high I will reschedule this event, please check back on this meetup site to see any updates.

See you all there!

Peter
item.name: Bon Fire Party
